mapper.insert: insert into OQC_Inspect_tbl ( OQC_Inspect_Number, OQC_Inspect_LotNo, OQC_Inspect_ItemCode, OQC_Inspect_Qty, OQC_Inspect_Customer, OQC_Inspect_Date, OQC_Inspect_Worker, OQC_Inspect_Value_1, OQC_Inspect_Value_2, OQC_Inspect_Value_3, OQC_Inspect_Value_4, OQC_Inspect_Value_5, OQC_Inspect_Value_6, OQC_Inspect_Value_7, OQC_Inspect_Value_8, OQC_Inspect_Value_9, OQC_Inspect_Value_10, OQC_Inspect_STND_1, OQC_Inspect_STND_2, OQC_Inspect_Status, OQC_Inspect_Result, OQC_Inspect_Remark, OQC_Inspect_Packing_Unit ) values ( #{OQC_Inspect_Number}, #{OQC_Inspect_LotNo}, #{OQC_Inspect_ItemCode}, #{OQC_Inspect_Qty}, #{OQC_Inspect_Customer}, now(), #{OQC_Inspect_Worker}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_1}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_2}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_3}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_4}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_5}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_6}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_7}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_8}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_9}, #{OQC_Inspect_Value_10}, #{OQC_Inspect_STND_1}, #{OQC_Inspect_STND_2}, #{OQC_Inspect_Status}, #{OQC_Inspect_Result}, #{OQC_Inspect_Remark}, #{OQC_Inspect_Packing_Unit} )
